channel.title: How to..........=P
channel.description:
Is there a tutorial anywhere on how I can make it to where, when an admin wears a certain item, they have infinite HP.
Someone please tell me how I can do this, or lead me in the right direction?....
Thanks.

item.title: How to..........=P
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

to make it so only admins can wear an item, add this code

if(playerRights <= 1 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 6570 == true) { // coded by Le Hawtz
remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 1);
sendMessage("You Need To Be An Administrator To Wear This Item"); 
}

this would make it so only admins can wear a fire cape, you can edit the itemd, playerRights, and the sendMessage if you like

Read full topic

item.title: How to..........=P
item.dc:creator: @MoparRocksScape MoparRocksScape
item.description:
@MoparRocksScape wrote:

No but there is a tutorial to ALWAYS have infinite health.
